title: Werebear Skye
description: Sharp teeth. Curved claws. Hot temper.New 2019 Revision!Skye wants to find the necromancer that killed her father and spill his evil blood. She's also a great person who happens to be a deadly werebear with a bad temper and an occasionally dirty mouth. Can she solve the dreadful murder mystery that has haunted her for ten years?This is an origin short story of Skye that takes place in the year 1997 twenty years before she meets the witch Black Annis in Demon Slayer (Revenge of the Witch #2).
author: Aubrey Law
